segments.advisor_message: So, uh, can we talk about your, uh, investments? Like, what kinda accounts do you hav, um, right now?
segments.client_message: Oh, yeah, I got, um, just a bank account and an ISA. The bank account's not much, just, uh, a few hundred quid. But the ISA, it, uh, has about five thousand pounds in it. Not sure if I want to, like, keep it there or, um, do somethin' else?
